definitions.definition: A flash of light ; a spark .
The twinkling of a star or other celestial body caused by turbulence in the Earth 's atmosphere .
The flash of light produced by something (especially a phosphor ) when it absorbs ionizing radiation .
A brief expression that is amusing or clever ; witticism .

main_definition: A flash of light ; a spark .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) The twinkling of a star or other celestial body caused by turbulence in the Earth 's atmosphere .
( nuclear physics ) The flash of light produced by something (especially a phosphor ) when it absorbs ionizing radiation .
( figurative ) A brief expression that is amusing or clever ; witticism .
